name: Steak & Asparagus Skewers Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: sirloin steak, asparagus, salt, pepper, canola oil, bamboo skewer
recipeIngredient: 1 pound sirloin steak, cut into 1-inch chunks
recipeInstructionSteps: Skewer 3-4 pieces of steak and asparagus in an alternating pattern on a bamboo skewer.
Repeat with remaining steak and asparagus.
Heat oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
Sear 3-4 skewers at a time, seasoning with salt and pepper, and flip when the undersides are a dark brown.
Season the other side with salt and pepper, and cook for about 1 more minute.
